Mushrooms Blockade.scenario: You step into a clearing of towering mushrooms. Their glowing caps slowly swivel... tracking your every movement. The ground hums beneath your feet

safe: The mushrooms were impressed with how in sync you were, they created a large opening for the fastest route
risky: While successful, the mushrooms were persistent on not letting you through, causing you to waste a lot of time as well as making you feel quite sore
balanced: Ask the mushrooms for safe passage
The mushrooms felt no desire to let you through, and found you quite laughable

The Annual Snail Parade.scenario: You've stumbled into the 14th Annual Snail Procession. Tiny banners wave. The snails are... very serious about this.

safe: Wait respectfully for them to pass
The snails truly appreciated this but the parade was far from fast. You wasted a lot of time. So much for being respectful.
risky: Move carefully between the lines, matching their pace
The snails were very angry but there's only so much they could do. You managed to zoom by and caused no harm, only an angry, but slow, mob of snails
balanced: Become overly enthusiastic and cheer them on
This was not the fastest option but with you joining the parade the snails felt a sense of invigoration. They moved faster and the parade went by quicker, but not by that much

Floral Grasp.scenario: You enter a field of delicate flowers. As you step forward, their stems gently curl around your ankles, tightening just enough to anchor you in place

safe: Stand still and let the flowers finish wrapping.
risky: Sing a soft song to calm the flowers.
balanced: Move slowly, lifting your feet carefully with each step.

The Wolf Guardian.scenario: A giant wolf wearing armor and holding a massive sword blocks your path.

safe: Approach gently and offer to pet him
risky: Throw a stick to distract him
balanced: Challenge him to an honorable duel

The Angry Shroombear.scenario: A massive Shroombear rears up, claws flashing in the moonlight.

safe: Punch in bravely in the stomach
balanced: Stand tall and attempt to indimidate it

The Mirror-Image Duel.scenario: You reach a crystal-clear pond where your reflection climbs out of the water, intent on taking your place in the real world.

safe: Confuse it by making the stupidest face possible until it loses its form
risky: Sacrifice your 'Reflection' (you'll never have one again) to make it disappear
balanced: Fight your reflection in a duel where you must move in perfect sync

The Merchant.scenario: Tobias the frog in a tiny coat sits behind a crooked wooden stall. 'Greetings, travelers... care to improve your survival odds? I have a few items available.'

item 1: Increase the timer for decision making
item 3: Reveals which option is safest in a future scenario

Fairy Fountain.scenario: Magical forest fairies greet you in front of a beautifully illuminated fountain. They giggle as they offer you a blessing for discovering their hidden sanctuary.

item 1: Heals you of all your ailments
item 2: Reveal the worst option on a decision

The Gardener.scenario: Tobias the forset florist tends to his magical flowers. He offers you some, inside are magical rewards.

item 1: Heals you of all your ailments

The Statue of the Greedy King.scenario: A golden statue blocks the path, its mouth open; it will only move if it 'tastes' something incredibly valuable

option 1: Lose the ability to choose answer one
option 2: Lose the ability to choose answer three
option 3: Lose the ability to choose answer two

The Glowing Bridge.scenario: A narrow bridge made of shimmering blue light stretches over a bottomless ravine. The glow flickers unpredictably.

option 1: Drop all your items to reduce weight
option 3: Cross anyways and see what happens

The Illuminated Portal.scenario: A mesmerizing portal sits in the middle of the woods. It feels as if it's calling to you and you can not avert your gaze unless you please it.

option 1: Toss in your item to close it
option 2: Keep staring back and sacrifice wizard's grasp
option 3: Throw in one of your companions, leaving them behind

The Goblin Interns.scenario: Three goblins in oversized business suits hand out aggressively professional flyers.

safe: Take a flyer and encourage them
balanced: Listen to their painfully long sales pitch

The Sad Cheese Seller.scenario: A tiny mouse chef sits behind a lonely cheese cart. 'No one believes in artisinal forest cheese anymore...'

The Whimsical Tree.scenario: An ancient and mythical tree blocks your path. 'I will only open the eay if you can answer my riddle: I am always hungry, I must be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?

Trapped Ogre.scenario: An ogre has fallen into a deep pit. 'HEY... a little help here?' A glowing potion sits just outside the hole.

helpful: Help him climb out using vines
selfish: Steal the potion while he's distracted

Abandoned Cart.scenario: A gnome's cart sits against a tree, a goblin is taking items from it and ushers you to help while the gnome doesn't notice.

helpful: Yell to the gnome and warn him
selfish: Raid the cart with the goblin

Witch's Soup.scenario: A witch has infested a pond full of tadpoles. She doesn't want to harm you as she is just using them to make soup.

helpful: Save the tadpoles by knocking out the wish
selfish: Indulge in the soup and bring it with you
